VREyeParametersMinimumFieldOfView.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The minimumFieldOfView read-only property of the interface describes the minimum supported field of view for the current eye.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
